name: Project SUBURBION
description:
Travel the subway and trade items in this minimalist roguelite.

In 2050, all means of traffic (except public transportation) have been outlawed, including cargo vehicles. Nowadays, many traders board the subway every day to travel across the urban area, buying low and selling high, to make ends meet. You need to pay your debt today: can you multiply your investment simply by toying with supply and demand?

Your goal is to get a certain amount of money before the time runs out. Keep an eye on the timetable to take the most efficient routes between the low-sellers and high-buyers. Stock is limited, so you'll need to explore the entire city. And who knows: maybe you'll find good deals near the edge of town.

Play with the mouse, other controls explained in-game, but here are some I forgot to mention:

  • Right click: Place a pin (use them as reminders!)
  • M: Toggle Music
  • F4+F5: Restart game instantaneously
  • F11: Toggle Fullscreen

To learn how to play, check out all the tooltips in-game! There are also some cheats: hold the right mouse button on top of the game title text (in the bottom left corner of the window) to use them.

Made in seven days for #7drl. Enjoy!
